column6: Na ɔafrɛ asaase fi wipuei ekodu n’atɔree."

column3: ahoɔfɛw a ewie pɛyɛ no mu
na ɔrennyɛ komm: Ogya bedzi n’enyim ahyew adze
column4: Na ehum etu huu etwa no ho ehyia."

column2: "Hom mboaboa m’ahotseweefo no ano mma me; Hɔn a wɔnam afɔrbɔ do nye me edzi ahyɛmu no."
"Na ɔsorsor ka ne tsenenee kyerɛ; Dɛ Nyankopɔn noara na ɔyɛ tsɛmbuafo."

column6: na miribedzi wo dase: Emi nye Nyankopɔn

column2: "Murunntwuw w’enyim wɔ wo kum afɔr ntsi
column3: Eso wo hyew afɔr a ɔwɔ m’enyim daa no ntsi."

column2: "Na kwaa mu mbowa nyina yɛ medze
column3: Na mbepɔw pem do mbowa so."

column2: "Minyim mbepɔw do ntumbowa nyinara: Na wiramu mbowadoma nyina so medze a."
"Bɔ ndaase afɔr ma Nyankopɔn; Na tua w’anohobadze ma Ɔsorsornyi no:"
"Na frɛ me wɔ hia da no mu; Mebɛgye wo
column3: na ɔwo so ahyɛ me enyimnyam."

column4: Ebɛn tum na ewɔ dɛ eka m’ahyɛdze kyerɛ
column5: Nna ɔwo afa m’ahyɛmu ato w’ano yi?"

column2: "Hwɛ dɛ ɔwo kor yi ara ikyir enyimtwuw
column3: Naaso etow me nsɛm gu w’ekyir."

column4: Na wo kyɛfa wɔ awartofo nkyɛn."

column2: "Ɔwo etsena ase na eka nsɛm dze tsia wo nua; Na idzi wankasa wo na ba ho anokum."

column3: na meyɛɛ komm ntsi; Ɔwo isusuu dɛ meyɛ dɛ obi a ɔtse dɛ ɔwoara: Na mebɛka w’enyim
column4: na mataataa no yie wɔ w’enyim."

column3: hom a hom werɛ efir Nyankopɔn
column4: Ma maanntsetsew hom mu esinesin a ɔgyefo bi nnyi hɔ."

column2: "Nyia ɔbɔ ndaase afɔr no ɔhyɛ me enyimnyam; Na nyia osiesie no kwan yie no Mebɛkyerɛ no Nyankopɔn no nkwagye."
